root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 5-2-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Data are collated by the WHO on behalf of the Inter-Agency Working Group on Violence against Women Data from publicly available survey data or data provided by National Statistics Offices or other relevant national entities through the consultation process with countries. For efficiency, some data are collated using existing data-compiling online platforms (e.g., DHS StatCompiler and the EU Fundamental Rights Agency Data Explorer).
